name: PeerMe MultiSig: Rename Multi-Sig
description: Change the friendly name of a registered multi-sig wallet. Use this when a user wants to update the display name of one of their registered multi-sigs.

inputs.name: Multi-Sig Address

description.en: The address of the multi-sig wallet to rename.
description.de: Die Adresse der Multi-Sig Wallet, die umbenannt werden soll.

inputs.bot: If the user refers to a multi-sig by its current name, first run 'My Multi-Sigs' to find the address.

description.en: The new friendly name for this multi-sig.
description.de: Der neue Name f√ºr diese Multi-Sig.
